title: I'm sleepy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sleep. Heal yourself tonight unless you saved yourself last night. If you aren't attacked, this ability goes on cooldown for an amount of rounss equal to the amount of times it's gone on cooldown
-Invite player to sleep with you, roleblocking them of they visit you. Multitaskable with ability 1.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Sleep without being attacked a total of 3 times
